narrative_summary: A narrative on the topic based on 250 relevant, highly-rated articles. AI in focus: Centre proposes changes in IT Rules to curb deepfakes; public feedback open till November 6 () Bhatti calls for integration of artificial intelligence in governance () Google AI mode rolled out: Top features for students to learn faster, smarter () Army used AI in a 'big way' during Operation Sindoor () Startups to giants: India rides the AI wave to sustainability () Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff says: I keep asking CEOs, what AI are they using for these big layoffs, and I think... () Fuel switch checks clear Boeing 787s, 737s in AI fleet () Reform to reduce regulatory overreach: Niti's Gauba to states ()
